Lyrics: 鷹を　鷹を放ちあげ
Transliteration: taka o taka o hanachi age
Direct Translation: set free the hawk, the hawk
Poetic Translation: The hawk, oh, the hawk set free, set it free,

Lyrics: 招ぐをなみ　あわれ
Poetic Translation: And at this summons, I am moved;
And at this summons, I weep.

Lyrics: 我がす　我がする時に
Transliteration: waga su waga suru toki ni
Direct Translation: at the time for me to act
Poetic Translation: When I leave, when I leave and fly away,
My husband, will we meet again?
My husband, will we meet again?

Transliteration: Markham, Elizabeth. Saibara: Japanese Court Songs of the Heian Period. Vol. 2. Cambridge: Cambridge UP, 1983. Print.
